PAID SUMMER OPPORTUNITIES - NCS 2016
Thank you for your continued support and enthusiasm in promoting the NCS programme to your students - you can see the real impact that NCS is having on our young people and our society here.
We write to you with the opportunity to share our paid summer roles for the staff and teachers at your school. For summer 2016 we have paid roles available across Greater London, Berkshire, Surrey, the West Midlands, Yorkshire and North-West England. Please pass this email on to your colleagues to let them know they can get involved with NCS this summer!
OUR SEASONAL ROLES
The NCS programme isn't just for young people - this year we have over 4,500 paid roles! In 2015 we worked with over 750 school-based staff from a variety of primary. secondary, independent & SEN backgrounds. Here's what our seasonal staff thought of the programme!
Whether you're looking to gain leadership experience, or to support young people with additional needs in our inclusive summer programme, we're bound to have the right role for you.
WHY JOIN OUR PROGRAMME?
Choose from a variety of roles - from Leadership through to skills Practitioners, to specialist Inclusion roles suitable for designated teachers and SENCOs.
You can fit your work on the NCS programme around your schedule, and top up your salary during the summer holidays with our competitive pay (e.g. £1,540 for a 14 day Leader role).
Our roles are also great for CPD - so you can gain experience working with young people outside of the classroom.
Last but not least, we promise you'll have the summer of a lifetime, whilst changing lives and making a difference in your local community!
HOW CAN YOU APPLY?
1) Look through our role descriptions You can browse through all of our seasonal roles here, and find more detailed information by selecting a role and downloading the role description.
2) Find out more about the NCS programme If you'd like to know more about the NCS programme, have a look through our NCS website - this will give you an idea of what you'll be getting up to over the summer!
3) Sign up & start your application! Follow the link below to our staffing website and 'sign up'. We'll then email you your login details so that you can start an application to work on the NCS programme!
Click here to sign up on the staffing website!
We hope to receive your application soon! The Challenge - Staffing Team
